mapper.insert: insert into patient (pid, pname, pgender, page, pbirth, paddress) values (#{pid}, #{pname}, #{pgender}, #{page}, #{pbirth}, #{paddress})
mapper.select: select count(*) from patient where pid = #{id}

select * from homepage hp join register r on hp.regid = r.regid join patient p on p.pid = r.pid left join hprel hpr on hpr.hpid = hp.hpid left join disease dis on dis.icdcode = hpr.icdcode where r.regid = #{regid}
